document_data.name: Achmed al-Assad
document_data.titles:
Master of the Enlightened Throne,
Worthy of the Gods,
Scourge of the Unbeliever,
Defender of the Faithful,
Confidant of Genies
document_data.mainbody: '''Achmed al-Assad''' was the father of [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir]]â€”the [[Grand Caliph]] of [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: Achmed served as the Grand Caliph until his death.
document_data.Relationships: Achmed was the eldest brother of [[Tannous al-Assad|Prince Tannous]] and [[Cheddah al-Assad|Prince Cheddah]]
